name: ai-verification-platform
description: AWS-based AI verification platform for academic documents

scripts.copy:frontend: if not exist dist\frontend mkdir dist\frontend && xcopy frontend dist\frontend /E /I /Y
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run update:config && npm run copy:frontend && aws s3 sync dist/frontend s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name AiVerificationPlatformStack --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`FrontendBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text) --delete
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run invalidate:cloudfront
